item.source: How do i make mosters drop an item ? & how do i make that drop rare?

item.title: How do i make mosters drop an item ? & how do i make that drop rare?
item.dc:creator: @T-R-A-V-I-S T-R-A-V-I-S
item.description:
@T-R-A-V-I-S wrote:

lol ill give u good guide

ok so first,

open up Item2.cfg
scroll to bottem
copy this and paste it in

public static int YourNpc[] = {item,item,item}; public static int randomYourNpc() { return YourNpc[(int)(Math.random()*YourNpc.length)]; }

}

YourNpc you will put the name of the npc you want for example"Paladin" ull add that into YourNpc
Item put the id of the items you want
save and close

Second step
Open up Npchandler.cfg

Look for something like this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 429) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomShade2(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

so copy that and paste this into same area

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == Id of your npc) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomYourNpc(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

Same name as Your other file “Paladin”
the id is the id of the monster you want

save and compile you should have any errors if you follow this correctly

Travis

Read full topic

item.source: How do i make mosters drop an item ? & how do i make that drop rare?

item.title: How do i make mosters drop an item ? & how do i make that drop rare?
item.dc:creator: @metalfan231 metalfan231
item.description:
@metalfan231 wrote:

How to make an NPC drop an item on Devolution source.
1:Open your server folder.
2:Open the config folder.
3:Open npcdrops with Notepad
4:Add something like this if you want a man to drop 1 blue phat at a 25% rate.
npcdrop = 1 (click tab once, can’t do it on this post >_<) 1040 (Tab) 1 (Tab) 25
5:Save (make sure runserver isn’t on, or it will not work) and you’re done!

Read full topic
